small_description: A YouTube data-grabbing bot built to easily get you the information of YouTube channels/videos/playlists.
big_description: A YouTube data-grabbing bot that brings you information about YouTube channels/videos/playlists, such as content length, ratiings, and popularity.
feature_description: The bot comes with the following commands, with their descriptions following:
feature_videos: video - Video information, including description, author, length of the video, video age, rating, tags
feature_channel: channel - Channel information, including description, latest community post, latest video upload, upload frequency, top uploads
